fn_tests.input_infer: test input ranges: value as an empty byte slice `&[]`, value as a one-element byte slice `&[0]`, value as a multi-element byte slice `&[1, 2, 3, 4, 5]`, value as a slice containing the maximum byte value `&[u8::MAX]`, value as a slice containing the minimum byte value `&[u8::MIN]`, value as a slice of size 255 `&[0; 255]`, value as a slice of size 256 `&[0; 256]` (may induce memory concerns), value as a slice of size 1_000_000 `&[1; 1_000_000]` (tests large input handling).
